actions.text: On agreeing to the Young (AK) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Young (AK).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Young (AK) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 113-16 to change the percentage of authorized State Allotment funding set aside for American Indian, Alaska Native, and Native Hawaiian employment and training grants. It replaces a provision that limits the set aside to no more than 1 percent of total funding with a fixed 1 percent guarantee.
purpose: Amendment changes the percentage of the authorized State Allotment funding set aside for American Indian, Alaska Native, and Native Hawaiian employment and training grants by replacing a provision that limits the set aside to no more than 1 percent of total funding with a fixed 1 percent guarantee.
